item.title: "Exhalation" by Ted Chiang
item.description: Actually this is a recommendation not just for the story "Exhalation" but for the entire collection of short stories by the same name. It's a really thought-provoking and cohesive collection that approaches our concepts of time and consciousness and choice from a variety of angles. But "Exhalation" the story is also available to read online if you are in the mood for an unusual sort of apocalypse. 6552 words. Link to story.
